snippet: Andy Murray beat Adrian Mannarino, 6-3, 6-3, to reach the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., earning his 496th career match win to tie Tim Henman as Britain’s most successful player of the Open era.
abstract: Andy Murray defeats Adrian Mannarino to advance to BNP Paribas Open tennis tournament quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray beat Adrian Mannarino, 6-3, 6-3, to reach the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., earning his 496th career match win to tie Tim Henman as Britain’s most successful player of the Open era.
